NotLoggedIn.title: You're not logged in
NotLoggedIn.description: Please log in to access your account and see personalized content.

NotAllowed.title: Access Denied
NotAllowed.description: You do not have permission to view this page. Please contact support.

ServerDeleted.title: Server Deleted
ServerDeleted.description: This server has been permanently deleted. If you believe this was a mistake or need access to a backup, please reach out to our support team. We may still have a backup available that we can restore for you.

ServerExpired.title: Server Expired
ServerExpired.description: Your server subscription has expired. To continue using your server, please extend your subscription. All your data is still safe and will be available once you renew.

landingpage.heroSubtitle: Launch your game server in seconds — reliable hardware and a friendly control panel.
landingpage.panelDesc: Manage your server with simple controls — start, stop, restart, and monitor performance without the fuss.
landingpage.fileManagerDesc: Open, edit and download files directly in your browser. Or connect via FTP.
landingpage.backupDesc: Automatic backups of your entire game server. (Coming soon :))
landingpage.ctaDesc: Choose a game and get your server online in minutes.

notAdminDescription: You do not have admin rights to view this page.

getHelp.title1: We don't have a FAQ yet, but you can
getHelp.contactIntro: Pick the category that fits best so we can get the right person on it.
getHelp.answerToEmail: We will still reply to the email from your account, it's easier :)
getHelp.weWillAnswer: and we will answer as quickly as possible
getHelp.ticketCreatedDescription: Thanks! We'll get back to you via email soon.
getHelp.ticketCreationFailed: Support ticket could not be created
getHelp.ticketCreationFailedDescription: Please try again or drop us an email instead.
getHelp.loginRequiredDescription: Log in so we can tie your ticket to your account and follow up by email.
getHelp.messageRequired: Add a short description so we can help.
getHelp.messageTooLong: The message is a bit long. Shorten it and try again.
getHelp.categoryHelper: This helps us route your ticket to the right teammate.

PROVISIONING.title: Server is being created
PROVISIONING.message: Your server is currently being provisioned.

CREATION_FAILED.title: Server creation failed
CREATION_FAILED.message: We couldn't create your server. Please contact support or try again.

ACTIVE.title: Server is ready
ACTIVE.message: Your server is up and running. You can connect now.

DOES_NOT_EXIST.title: Server not found
DOES_NOT_EXIST.message: We couldn't find this server. If this persists, contact support.

PAYMENT_FAILED.title: Payment failed
PAYMENT_FAILED.message: Your payment did not go through. Please try again.

PAYMENT_PROCESSING.title: Processing payment
PAYMENT_PROCESSING.message: We're processing your payment. This should only take a moment.

EXPIRED.title: Server expired
EXPIRED.message: This server has expired. Please renew to continue.

DELETED.title: Server deleted
DELETED.message: This server was deleted and is no longer available.

poller.headline: Hang tight, we're preparing your server
poller.subheadline: This page updates automatically once provisioning finishes.
poller.statusUnknownDescription: We're confirming your payment and provisioning details.
poller.networkErrorMessage: We couldn't reach our provisioning service. Please try again in a moment.
poller.errorSubheadline: We couldn't finish provisioning your server. Check the details below or reach out to support.
poller.networkSubheadline: We lost contact with the provisioning service. You can retry or contact our support team.
poller.successSubheadline: Jump in right away or let us redirect you automatically.
poller.errorBannerDescription: Current status: {status}. Reach out to support if this persists.
poller.networkBannerDescription: We can't reach the provisioning service right now. We'll automatically retry shortly.
poller.feature1Description: We handle the setup behind the scenes and let you know the moment it's ready.
poller.feature2Description: Servers launch with best-practice defaults so you can start playing immediately.
poller.feature3Description: Need help? Our team is ready to assist if you run into any issues.

info.title: Upgrade Information
info.description: Here you can only extend or upgrade your server. Downgrades aren't possible yet.

auth.loginRequiredGameConfig: You need to be logged in to configure game-specific settings

payment.title: Complete Your Payment
payment.footerHint: Complete payment above to create your server

gameConfig.title: {game} Configuration
gameConfig.noSpecific: No specific configuration options available for this game.

RegisterLogin.title: Welcome
RegisterLogin.subtitle: Register with your Discord or Google account

login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Login with your Discord or Google account

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a reset link.

success.request: If an account exists for that email, we've sent reset instructions.

errors.requestFailed: We couldn't send the reset email. Please try again.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.subtitle: Set a new password to regain access to your account.

success.reset: Your password has been updated. You can now log in.

errors.tokenMissing: The reset token is missing. Please use the link from your email.
errors.tokenInvalid: This reset link is invalid or has expired. Request a new one.
errors.resetFailed: We couldn't reset your password. Please try again.
errors.generic: Something went wrong while validating your reset link.

verifyEmail.title: Verify your email
verifyEmail.subtitle: We sent a verification link to {email}.
verifyEmail.subtitleFallback: We sent a verification link to your email address.
verifyEmail.description: Open the link in that email to activate your account.

status.sent: Verification email sent. Please check your inbox.
status.error: We couldn't resend the email. Please try again.
status.missingEmail: We need an email address to resend the verification link.
status.verifiedInfo: You're all set. Head back to your dashboard to keep going.

tips.checkSpam: Check your spam or junk folder if you don't see the email.
tips.contact: Still nothing? Contact support and we'll help you out.
tips.typo: Used the wrong email during sign up? Register again with the correct address.

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least {min} characters

RegisterLogin.disclaimer: By clicking continue, you agree to our <terms>Terms of Service</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

payments.oauthPasswordChangeNotice2: , you can't change your password here.
payments.oauthPasswordChangeTooltip: Password changes are only possible when you sign in with email.

changeGame.flavorChangeDesc: You're switching between different versions of the same game. Your world data will be preserved unless you choose to delete all files.
changeGame.gameChangeTitle: Warning: All files will be deleted!
changeGame.gameChangeDesc: Switching to a different game requires a clean installation. All existing files will be permanently deleted. Make sure to backup anything important before continuing!
changeGame.gameChangeCheckbox: Delete all files (required for game changes)
changeGame.filesKeptDesc: Your current server files and world data will be kept during the reinstallation. This is recommended for flavor changes within the same game.
changeGame.filesDeletedDesc: Your current server files and world data will be permanently deleted before reinstalling. This ensures a clean installation but you will lose all existing data.
